Package org.dellroad.muxable.simple

Simple implementation(s) of the MuxableChannel interface.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProtocolReader.InputHandler
    Callback interface invoked by a ProtocolReader.
    ProtocolWriter.OutputHandler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChannelIds
    Tracks channel ID's for the SimpleMuxableChannel framing protocol.
    OutputQueue
    A output queue of bytes stored in ByteBuffers.
    ProtocolConstants
    Constants used in the SimpleMuxableChannel framing protocol.
    ProtocolReader
    Input state machine for the SimpleMuxableChannel framing protocol.
    ProtocolWriter
    Output state machine for the SimpleMuxableChannel framing protocol.
    SimpleMuxableChannel
    An implementation of the MuxableChannel interface that multiplexes nested channels over a single underlying ByteChannel (or ReadableByteChannel, WritableByteChannel pair) using a simple framing scheme.
    SimpleNestedChannelRequest
    A straightforward implementation of the NestedChannelRequest interface.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ProtocolViolationException
    Exception thrown when a SimpleMuxableChannel framing protocol violation is detected.

Package org.dellroad.muxable.simple Description

Simple implementation(s) of the MuxableChannel interface.
